h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Fine China Tea Bowl Location
content: As mentioned, finding this Curios item isn't the easiest. The Fine China Tea Bowl is in a box by a statue and a blade-wielding enemy in the Pagoda Realm along the lowest level. From the Lower Pagoda Shrine in The New West continue along to the end of the path, ignoring the stairs up a level.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fine_China_Tea_Bowl.md', within the main section titled 'Fine China Tea Bowl', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Fine China Tea Bowl Location'.
The content is as follows:
As mentioned, finding this Curios item isn't the easiest. The Fine China Tea Bowl is in a box by a statue and a blade-wielding enemy in the Pagoda Realm along the lowest level. From the Lower Pagoda Shrine in The New West continue along to the end of the path, ignoring the stairs up a level.
